original_text: He put the altar for burnt offerings outside the entrance of the Tent of Meeting. He offered a burnt offering and a grain offering on it, as the Lord had commanded him.
korean_text: 또 회막의 성막 문 앞에 번제단을 두고 번제와 소제를 그 위에 드리니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: He put the altar for burnt offerings
outside the entrance of the Tent of Meeting
and a grain offering on it
as the Lord had commanded him
